code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:M aged 21 yrs presents with Kidney for past 7 days. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 185 cm, Weight 95 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:pt says he is having symptoms of Kidney 17 x week, in spite of treatment. he is a white male student aged 21 yrs. o:Height 184 cm, Weight 92.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered hemodialysis - vena cava.

content2.Unmatched: pt says he is having symptoms

td.content: s:pt C/O Kidney. NKDA. pt is a M aged 22 yrs. o:Height 183 cm, Weight 91.4 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis.
